detailed_description: A C++ library that provides Zarr storage support for the xtensor ecosystem. It enables efficient reading and writing of chunked, compressed N-dimensional arrays in the Zarr format, facilitating high-performance scientific computing in C++.

name: py-wsi
one_line_profile: Whole Slide Image (WSI) processing for machine learning

name: VirtualiZarr
one_line_profile: Create virtual Zarr stores from legacy data formats
detailed_description: A tool to create 'virtual' Zarr stores that reference data in other formats (like NetCDF) without duplication. It enables cloud-optimized access patterns on legacy archival data using xarray syntax.

name: pydantic-zarr
one_line_profile: Pydantic models for Zarr metadata validation
detailed_description: A Python library providing Pydantic models to validate and structure Zarr hierarchy and metadata. It ensures data integrity and type safety when working with Zarr storage specifications.

name: zarr-python
one_line_profile: Python implementation of chunked, compressed, N-dimensional arrays
detailed_description: The reference Python implementation of the Zarr storage format. It provides a NumPy-like interface for working with large, chunked arrays stored in various backends (local, cloud, zip), essential for modern scientific data storage.

name: zarrs
one_line_profile: Rust library for the Zarr storage format

name: zarrs-python
one_line_profile: Python bindings for the zarrs Rust crate
detailed_description: Provides accelerated codec pipelines for Zarr in Python by leveraging the Rust-based `zarrs` library. It aims to improve performance for encoding and decoding Zarr data within the Python ecosystem.

name: ZnH5MD
